record.field: Only one order point is allowed for each product-location pair.
You cannot define for the same product two order points with opposite locations (from "Storage Location" to "Provisioning Location" and vice versa).
You cannot define for the same product two order points with opposite locations (from "Overflowing Location" to "Provisioning Location" and vice versa).
There are some supplier moves that are late.
There are some customer moves that are late.
